## NECT\_MINIMUM\_NET\_DEBT variable

A Trove must always have at least this much debt on top of the [liquidation reserve](./lib-base.nect_liquidation_reserve.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
NECT_MINIMUM_NET_DEBT: Decimal
```

## Remarks

Any transaction that would result in a Trove with less net debt than this will be reverted.
